cascade.text:
an 11-month old baby is among the hostages at the kosher supermarket in paris. unbearably sad.
http://t.co/yxxlhehst9
@BklynMiddleton rumors say hostages are 1 women and 4 childrens---
@BklynMiddleton sorrow is not the emotion one should have at this stage. maybe afterwards. right now, it's appropriate to be filled w rage
@BklynMiddleton is it just a coincidence that kosher market thing or a missibg part of the picture ?
RT @BklynMiddleton: An 11-month old baby is among the hostages at the Kosher supermarket in #ParisAttack
@BklynMiddleton @paytheline11 Some people can control their "rage" enough to make and think logically, even at times like this.
@BklynMiddleton if you're not angry that jihadists are taking 11month old hostages you're doing something wrong. be honest, you are
@paytheline11 Maybe you should scroll through my tweets.
@BklynMiddleton really sad. Ever seen fotos of gaza babies ? All babies r equal i suppose
@BklynMiddleton i'll get right on that
*Mutes Universe*

@BklynMiddleton The pause button is broken and there is no rewind function.
It's terrifying when you think about it.
@BklynMiddleton it's a dialogue isn't it? please don't take my comment as attacking. i am not sad.. yet. im stark raving mad.
@BklynMiddleton It's that kind of day. The kind where you want to go back to bed with some fiction to distract.
@pptsapper Or the day you wonder why you didn't just study creative writing and adopt some nice cats in Vermont.... or something.
@BklynMiddleton I could become a novelist and live in the woods of northern Maine...with no internet. And ditto cat(s)
@Jon_Startin @BklynMiddleton they are better people than most then.  because this is not worthy of sorrow IMO. it should make you angry
@BklynMiddleton u r among the only journalists saying kosher market & not calling it something generic. If it's kosher it was targeted. Thx
@PD28 @BklynMiddleton Hashtag #kosher shows lots of journalists are referring to it as a kosher supermarket.
@BklynMiddleton can i borrow your universal mute button?
@BklynMiddleton rather than being a 'lone-wolf copy-cat' the fact the attacker is so well-armed points to a far more worrying escalation.
@tsrosenberg @BklynMiddleton that's my mistake. Thanks!
@PD28 @BklynMiddleton No problem! Wish it weren't such a horrible situation.
